title: How to download paid app free on iphone - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no requirement for jail breaking just to download Paid app for free. First find someone who has the paid apps you need in your circle, or if you liked a paid in your friends phone which you want to download for free, follow along; In your iPhone go to Settings > iTunes & App Store.Tap on your Apple ID and choose “Sign out”.Ask your friend to login with his credentials.Go to “App Store” app. Tap on the last tab “Updates”. At top, tap on “Purchased” row.Bingo. You see all your free and paid apps your friend has downloaded. Choose whichever paid app you want to download to your iPhone.This is doing something illegal in a legal way. :) Every week Apple releases a paid app as “Free app of the week” in app store. You can check every week and download too.

Trust me when i say u can download paid apps for free on ios download vshare app Only thing is the installation takes 5,6 steps once you have vshare you can get all paid apps free (they are stable ) other alternatives like kuaiyong need too much computer usage as well as everything is chinese If jailbroken (like me) use app cake
